creditline: Gift of Mrs. George P. Douglas, 1955
markings: Collector's: D stamp printed on verso; two watermarks with escutcheons including rampant lions and the gothic letters MC. Beneath one is the date MDCCCXXVIII
signed:
In pencil in lower margin:  Jo Pennell Imp;
Etched in lower edge of the plate:  Joseph Pennell - The Stack - 1909
title: The Great Stack, Sheffield
